name: Prettydateintl
body:
### Humanize your dates
Instead of uglt dates such as_ Monday, April, 1st 2013_ or _2012-09-18 20:00:00_ display relative dates such as _just now_, _yesterday_ or _2 years ago_.

Simply apply the dateme() method on the elements you would like to be changed.

```javascript
$('.date').dateme();
```

### Internationalize (i18n) your dates

What if you want your dates to be displayed in French, Korean or Klingon ? Just set the language code of your choice such as `lang:'de'` or `lang:'de_LU'`.

```javascript
$('.date').dateme({lang:'fr'})
```

You can use featured languages packs or create your own.
tagline: jQuery plugin to make the date pretty. i18n compilant
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
